org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation

类 ExtendedServletRequestDataBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.validation.DataBinder
      • org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder
        • org.springframework.web.bind.ServletRequestDataBinder
          • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ExtendedServletRequestDataBinder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.PropertyEditorRegistry, org.springframework.beans.TypeConverter

    public class ExtendedServletRequestDataBinder
extends ServletRequestDataBinder
    Subclass of ServletRequestDataBinder that adds URI template variables to the values used for data binding.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.1

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder

      • 从类继承的字段 org.springframework.validation.DataBinder

        DEFAULT_AUTO_GROW_COLLECTION_LIMIT, DEFAULT_OBJECT_NAME, logger

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExtendedServletRequestDataBinder

        public ExtendedServletRequestDataBinder(@Nullable
                                        Object target)
        Create a new instance, with default object name.
        参数:
        target - the target object to bind onto (or null if the binder is just used to convert a plain parameter value)
        另请参阅:
        DataBinder.DEFAULT_OBJECT_NAME

      • ExtendedServletRequestDataBinder

        public ExtendedServletRequestDataBinder(@Nullable
                                        Object target,
                                        String objectName)
        Create a new instance.
        参数:
        target - the target object to bind onto (or null if the binder is just used to convert a plain parameter value)
        objectName - the name of the target object
        另请参阅:
        DataBinder.DEFAULT_OBJECT_NAME

    • 方法详细资料

      • addBindValues

        protected void addBindValues(org.springframework.beans.MutablePropertyValues mpvs,
                             javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Merge URI variables into the property values to use for data binding.
        覆盖:
        addBindValues 在类中 ServletRequestDataBinder
        参数:
        mpvs - the property values that will be used for data binding
        request - the current request
